alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 10 at 12:51AM PST until February 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of dense fog, with visibility less than a quarter of a miles at times. * WHERE...In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon, Lower Columbia, and the Willamette Valley, including the Portland, Salem and Eugene areas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will gradually increase overnight, then begin to thin and dissipate after 10 am Thursday.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. If walking or biking, weather reflective material to make yourself more visible in the fog.

area.areaDesc: Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
